EnumProperty.Name: DebuggerConfiguration
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies a pre-defined MSBuild solution to interface.

EnumValue.Name: Custom
EnumValue.Description: Custom MSBuild implementation. Debugger properties must be correct.

StringProperty.Name: DebuggerTargetApk
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the location of the Android Application package to be installed and debugged.

StringProperty.Name: DebuggerCustomLaunchActivity
StringProperty.Description: Override the default launch activity. If unset, debugger will use activity with 'android.intent.category.LAUNCHER' intent.

BoolProperty.Name: DebuggerDebugMode
BoolProperty.Description: Launch the Application in 'debug mode'. This suspends execution until a JDB client has attached, allowing GDB to debug native launch/startup methods.

BoolProperty.Name: DebuggerOpenGlTrace
BoolProperty.Description: Launch the Application in 'trace mode'. This enables runtime and performance checking of OpenGL ES functionality.

BoolProperty.Name: DebuggerKeepAppData
BoolProperty.Description: Ensures that existing data remains for if the Application is re-installed.

StringListProperty.Name: DebuggerLibraryPaths
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies the location of libraries used by the Application to be exposed to the debugger.
